item.title: Execute Whole Product Technical Communication
item.description: While the concept of whole product technical communication sounds simple, the execution is anything but straightforward. In this post, we are going to look a bit harder at the issue in the hope of coming up with actionable items. Where are we now – a simplified responsibility matrix The less-than-ideal situation in which many technology products find themselves is due to the insufficient coordination between marketing teams and technology teams. With the rise of customer-centric methodology, what had worked before needs adjustment.
